snippet: George S. McGovern, 89, the former senator from South Dakota and Democratic presidential nominee in 1972, was released Thursday from a Florida hospital.
abstract: George S McGovern, the former senator from South Dakota and Democratic presidential nominee in 1972, is released from a Florida hospital; tests to determine why McGovern occasionally passes out and loses his ability to speak are inconclusive.
lead_paragraph: George S. McGovern, 89, the former senator from South Dakota and Democratic presidential nominee in 1972, was released Thursday from a Florida hospital.

headline.main: S. Dakota: Mcgovern Is Released From Hospital
headline.print_headline: S. Dakota: Mcgovern Is Released From Hospital
